entities.name: avada kedavra
entities.description: One of the three curses mentioned by Professor Moody as being known as the Unforgivable Curses.

entities.name: imperius
entities.description: One of the three curses mentioned by Professor Moody as being known as the Unforgivable Curses.

entities.name: cruciatus
entities.description: One of the three curses mentioned by Professor Moody as being known as the Unforgivable Curses.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison where those who use the Unforgivable Curses on a fellow human being can be sent.

entities.name: professor moody
entities.description: The teacher who is teaching the class about the Unforgivable Curses.

relationships.description: Both Avada Kedavra and Imperius are mentioned as being known as the Unforgivable Curses.
All three curses, including Avada Kedavra, are mentioned as being known as the Unforgivable Curses.
Both Imperius and Cruciatus are mentioned as being known as the Unforgivable Curses.
The use of Avada Kedavra on a fellow human being can result in a life sentence in Azkaban.
The use of Imperius on a fellow human being can result in a life sentence in Azkaban.
The use of Cruciatus on a fellow human being can result in a life sentence in Azkaban.
